name: Aerobics Training
about: Aerobics is a form of physical exercise that combines rhythmic aerobic exercise.

name: Cardio Training
about: Regular cardio workouts can: Strengthen your heart and blood vessels. Improve the flow of oxygen throughout your body.

name: Cross Fit Training
about: CrossFit is a strength and conditioning workout that is made up of functional movement performed at a high intensity level.

name: Endurance Training
about: Endurance activity keeps your heart, lungs and circulatory system healthy and improves your overall fitness.

name: Increase Strength Training
about: Strength training or resistance training involves the performance of physical exercises that are designed to improve strength and endurance.

name: Weight Lose Training
about: In general, it means that to lose 1 1/2 pounds (0.7 kilograms) a week, you need to reduce your daily calories by 500 to 750 calories.
